abstract: After a 16-year hiatus, the crosstown rivals will resume playing each other in Florida.
snippet: After a 16-year hiatus, the crosstown rivals will resume playing each other in Florida.
lead_paragraph: After a 16-year hiatus, the Mets and Yankees will resume playing spring-training games against each other next March, said a Yankees official who declined to be identified. The teams are tentatively scheduled to play games at each other's complexes in Port St. Lucie and Tampa.

headline.main: Mets to Play Yankees in Spring Training
